sources.title: Katie Did It (1951 Classic, Film Noir, Comedy)
sources.description: TAGLINE: 01) KATIE DID IT ... and WAS it FUN! 02) She May Have Gone Wrong but Boy!... she wasn't Bad! STORYLINE: Katherine Standish, who has been brought up in a strict manner in a prudish New England town, falls in love with a city slicker commercial artist, Peter Van Arden. The romance blossoms until Katie falls victim of some false information, and becomes convinced that Peter is already married and the father of two children. _IMDb ** The non-profit streaming of the commercial free, quality films I have very much enjoyed and therefore uploaded to archive.org , are for educational purposes . I have uploaded each movie for posterity , with the hope that all present and future generations will learn from and enjoy them, as much as I have. I own zero rights to this film, nor to any other I have uploaded, and I receive nothing for the uploads nor for the information I put with those uploads. Although I do receive great joy from sharing these uploads with you, I have no wish to infringe on any existing copyright laws. DEF gp ddh ** (Another great oldie, Chris Johnson!)

metadata.Plot: Katherine Standish, who has been brought up in a strict manner in a prudish New England town, falls in love with a city slicker commercial artist, Peter Van Arden. The romance blossoms until Katie falls victim of some false information, and becomes convinced that Peter is already married and the father of two children.
metadata.Actors: Ann Blyth, Mark Stevens, Cecil Kellaway
